translation.aboutme_professional_summary_content: Versatile software engineer with a strong background in front-end development, specializing in React, TypeScript, Vue and modern web technologies. Most recent work experience at Metaplay, with previous experience in companies like Aiforsite and Loihde. Also competed professionally as a StarCraft II player for over a decade with a handful of Finnish national level championships.
translation.aboutme_get_in_touch_content: I’m always interested in new opportunities, collaborations, and challenging projects in software development. Feel free to reach out — and if you’re a StarCraft II or RTS fan, I’m always happy to chat about that too!
